South Ribble Borough Council is inviting tenders for the construction of a reinforced grass overflow parking area at Moss Side Playing Fields, Moss Side Way, Leyland.  The works propose to provide additional parking space to the existing parking provision on site.

contracts.description:
South Ribble Borough Council is inviting tenders for the extension of the reinforced grass overflow parking area Worden Park, Leyland.  The works purpose is to provide an additional 128 parking spaces to the existing parking provision on site.
